solution_line_template: Michael has used a total of {num_houses} matchstick houses * {matchsticks_per_house} matchsticks per matchstick house = <<{num_houses}*{matchsticks_per_house}={matchsticks_used}>>{matchsticks_used} matchsticks.

As he only used half of his collection for crafting, he must have originally had {matchsticks_used} matchsticks * {half_multiplier} = <<{matchsticks_used}*{half_multiplier}={original_matchsticks}>>{original_matchsticks} matchsticks.
